dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Casual discussion about a news article

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, wait. So, the article says like, three deaths last week? From protests?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, wait. So, the article says like, three deaths last week? From protests?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since violent clashes between Black Lives Matter protesters and counter-protesters in Kenosha and Portland led to three deaths last week, the Biden and Trump campaigns have repeatedly called on each other to denounce protest violence while accusing each other of supporting it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh-huh. Three people died in Kenosha and Portland, from these violent clashes between protesters and counter-protesters.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh-huh. Three people died in Kenosha and Portland, from these violent clashes between protesters and counter-protesters.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since violent clashes between Black Lives Matter protesters and counter-protesters in Kenosha and Portland led to three deaths last week, the Biden and Trump campaigns have repeatedly called on each other to denounce protest violence while accusing each other of supporting it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: And then Trump... he defended the guy accused of murder? The 17-year-old?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then Trump... he defended the guy accused of murder? The seventeen-year-old?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Donald Trump on Monday defended the violent actions of a caravan of his supporters in Portland, Ore., as well as those of Kyle Rittenhouse, a 17-year-old accused of murdering two protesters in Kenosha, Wisconsin.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Kyle Rittenhouse. He said it was an 'interesting situation,' um, and claimed Rittenhouse was trying to get away.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, Kyle Rittenhouse. He said it was an 'interesting situation,' um, and claimed Rittenhouse was trying to get away.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Asked about Rittenhouse, Trump called it an interesting situation, and claimed Rittenhouse was trying to get away from protesters who violently attacked him, asserting, without evidence, that Rittenhouse probably would've been killed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: But he, like, shot people? And Trump thinks he was trying to get away? That doesn't... make sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he, like, shot people? And Trump thinks he was trying to get away? That doesn't... make sense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he also, uh, called Rittenhouse's family later to express support. And he, you know, privately felt the media was unfairly portraying his actions as 'purely malicious.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he also, uh, called Rittenhouse's family later to express support. And he, you know, privately felt the media was unfairly portraying his actions as 'purely malicious.'

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: And Biden... did he say anything about it? I thought he'd be, like, super against all violence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Biden... did he say anything about it? I thought he'd be, like, super against all violence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: He did. Biden, uh, sternly condemned all protest violence. He said 'rioting is not protesting,' and called for Trump to do the same.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did. Biden, uh, sternly condemned all protest violence. He said 'rioting is not protesting,' and called for Trump to do the same.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden offered a stern condemnation of protest violence in his speech, declaring rioting is not protesting after unequivocally denouncing violence on the left and right and calling on Trump to do the same in a statement on Sunday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: But Trump didn't like that, did he? I bet he found a problem with it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But Trump didn't like that, did he? I bet he found a problem with it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. The Trump team, um, criticized Biden for not specifically mentioning groups like Antifa in his denunciation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. The Trump team, um, criticized Biden for not specifically mentioning groups like Antifa in his denunciation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bidens remarks were met with immediate dissatisfaction from the Trump team, with Trump campaign advisor Jason Miller hitting Biden for not specifically mentioning radical left-wing groups like Antifa in his blanket denunciation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: But then, didn't Trump, like, defend his own supporters who were shooting paintballs at people?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then, didn't Trump, like, defend his own supporters who were shooting paintballs at people?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But given the opportunity to denounce a caravan of his supporters in Portland, who were caught on video Saturday shooting protesters with paintballs or tear gas, Trump called it a peaceful protest and declared paint is not bullets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: He did. He called that a 'peaceful protest,' saying 'paint is not bullets' even though, you know, it was a caravan of his supporters shooting at others.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did. He called that a 'peaceful protest,' saying 'paint is not bullets' even though, you know, it was a caravan of his supporters shooting at others.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But given the opportunity to denounce a caravan of his supporters in Portland, who were caught on video Saturday shooting protesters with paintballs or tear gas, Trump called it a peaceful protest and declared paint is not bullets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: And he, like, thinks Antifa is secretly funded by 'shadowy globalist organizations'? That's a lot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he, like, thinks Antifa is secretly funded by 'shadowy globalist organizations'? That's a lot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that was his private belief. So, you see this real contrast, right? Biden broadly condemning violence, then Trump focusing on 'left-wing' groups and defending actions by his own supporters.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that was his private belief. So, you see this real contrast, right? Biden broadly condemning violence, then Trump focusing on 'left-wing' groups and defending actions by his own supporters.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden offered a stern condemnation of protest violence in his speech, declaring rioting is not protesting after unequivocally denouncing violence on the left and right...Trump, who spent much of his White House briefing taking shots at Democrats, claiming Biden didnt mention the far-left...But given the opportunity to denounce a caravan of his supporters in Portland, who were caught on video Saturday shooting protesters with paintballs or tear gas, Trump called it a peaceful protest

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: It's just... a really messy situation, uh, with who's saying what.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just... a really messy situation, uh, with who's saying what.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And it's all happening, um, with Trump planning that visit to Kenosha, too, despite the governor's warnings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And it's all happening, um, with Trump planning that visit to Kenosha, too, despite the governor's warnings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Trump is slated to travel to Kenosha on Tuesday to survey the damage from the protests, despite Wisconsin Gov. Tony Evers urging him not to.
